error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect or SNMP timed out

bandwidth_enable_disable.description:
Enable bandwidth collection for this device.

If you choose Attributes, bandwidth values are added to port entities (no history).
If you choose Sensors, separate bandwidth sensors are created (history).
bandwidth_enable_disable.title: Bandwidth Sensors

bandwidth_poll_interval.description: Set the polling interval used to calculate bandwidth/traffic.
bandwidth_poll_interval.title: Bandwidth Sensors

bandwidth_sensors.description: Enable optional RX/TX throughput and total traffic sensors for selected interfaces.
bandwidth_sensors.title: Bandwidth Sensors

environmental_enable_disable.description:
Enable environmental/PoE monitoring for this device.

If you choose Attributes, values are added to port entities (no history).
If you choose Sensors, separate sensor entities are created (history).
environmental_enable_disable.title: Environmental Sensors

environmental_sensors.description: Enable optional environmental and PoE monitoring for this device.
environmental_sensors.title: Environmental Sensors

init.description: Manage per-device overrides and advanced settings.
init.title: Device Options

user.description: Provide SNMP access details. Uses SNMP v2c.
user.title: Connect to your switch

error.invalid_oid: Invalid OID format (must be numeric dotted OID)

bandwidth_enable.description: Turn bandwidth sensor entities on or off for this device.
bandwidth_enable.title: Bandwidth Sensors

bandwidth_enable_disable.description:
Enable bandwidth collection for this device.

If you choose **Attributes**, bandwidth values are added to port entities (no history).
If you choose **Sensors**, separate bandwidth sensors are created (history).
bandwidth_enable_disable.title: Bandwidth Sensors

bandwidth_exclude_rules.description:
Add or remove exclude rules. Exclude rules always take precedence.

Current rules: {current_rules}
bandwidth_exclude_rules.title: Bandwidth Sensor Exclude Rules

bandwidth_icons.description: Optional icon overrides for bandwidth sensors. Leave blank to use defaults.
bandwidth_icons.title: Bandwidth Sensor Icons

bandwidth_include_rules.description:
Add or remove include rules. If any include rules are set, only matching interfaces will get bandwidth sensors.

Current rules: {current_rules}
bandwidth_include_rules.title: Bandwidth Sensor Include Rules

bandwidth_poll_interval.description: Set the poll interval for bandwidth sensors. Lower intervals update more often but increase SNMP load.
bandwidth_poll_interval.title: Bandwidth Sensors

bandwidth_sensors.description: Enable optional RX/TX throughput and total traffic sensors for selected interfaces.
bandwidth_sensors.title: Bandwidth Sensors

builtin_filters.description:
Enable or disable built-in vendor interface filter rules for this device.

Disabled rules will not be applied during interface discovery.
builtin_filters.title: Built-in Vendor Filters

connection_and_naming_overrides.description: Optional per-device overrides. Leave blank to use values from initial setup.
connection_and_naming_overrides.title: Connection & Name

custom_oids.description: Override diagnostic sensor OIDs for this device only. Leave blank to use automatic detection.
custom_oids.title: Custom Diagnostic OIDs

device_options.description: Manage per-device overrides and advanced settings.
device_options.title: Device Options

entity_icon_rules.title: Entity Icon Rules

environmental_enable_disable.description: Choose whether environmental/PoE data is stored as attributes (no history) or separate sensors (history).
environmental_enable_disable.title: Environmental Sensors

environmental_poll_interval.description: How often to poll environmental values (in seconds).
environmental_poll_interval.title: Environmental polling interval

environmental_sensors.description: Enable optional environmental and PoE monitoring for this device.
environmental_sensors.title: Environmental Sensors

exclude_rules.title: Exclude Rules

include_rules.title: Include Rules

manage_interfaces.description: Manage which interfaces are created as Home Assistant entities.
manage_interfaces.title: Manage Interfaces

poe_poll_interval.description: How often to poll PoE power values (in seconds).
poe_poll_interval.title: PoE polling interval

port_name_rules.description:
Customize how interface names are displayed in the UI and card.

Built-in rules are provided as examples and can be disabled per device.
port_name_rules.title: Interface Name Rules

port_rename_custom.description: Add or remove your own regex-based display name rules. Custom rules take priority over built-in rules.
port_rename_custom.title: Custom Rename Rules

port_rename_custom_add.description:
Create a regex rule that transforms the displayed interface name.

Example pattern: ^Gi(\\d+)/0/(\\d+)$
Example replace: Uplink-\\1-\\2
port_rename_custom_add.title: Add Rename Rule

port_rename_custom_edit.description: Select an existing rule to edit.
port_rename_custom_edit.title: Edit Custom Name Rule

port_rename_custom_remove.title: Remove Rename Rule

port_rename_defaults.title: Built-in Rename Rules

interface_ip_display.title: IP-weergave van interfaces
interface_ip_display.description: Bepaalt hoe IP-adressen op interfaces worden weergegeven.

data_description.hide_ip_on_physical: Indien ingeschakeld worden IP-adressen alleen weergegeven op virtuele of logische interfaces (zoals VLAN- of beheerinterfaces).
